trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Muskegon
There were no other sightings in Muskegon on or around November 22nd 2011
divs: sighting detailswe were driving south on us 31 going from muskegon to grand haven michigan. i was passanger, my wife was driving. a flash and orange light\glow attracted my attention. as i looked to the west, an orange sphere was passing into the cloud layer. its path of direction was at an angle of around 70 degrees. its speed was faster than aircraft i feel. it flashed again after passing into the cloud layer lighting up the the underside of the clouds and this light quickly ended.
